name: SCATTERED (captainslow48)
description:
What would you do when you’re a scientist living with a 100 cats?

Well you build a multi-dimensional litter box of course!

So just dispose them elsewhere! Simple, fast and free from neighbour’s complaints!

But! To err is to be human and the said scientist is no exception, mind you.

One careless mistake could mean turning his entire prototype into a shattered limbo between worlds where gravity forces can take away all of his dear little feline friends.

The scientist immediately tells himself: “I might be a mad genius but I cannot live without my 100 cats! I must save them!”

Thus, the journey begins.
